name: vscode-forge-tools
description: Visual Studio Code extension for accessing Autodesk Platform Services.
author: Petr Broz <petr.broz@autodesk.com>

autodesk.forge.environments.description: List of APS environments to switch between

autodesk.forge.viewer.extensions.description: Viewer extensions to be used when previewing derivatives.

autodesk.forge.viewer.env.description: Custom Model Derivative environment used by the APS Viewer. By default, the viewer will determine the appropriate environment based on the viewable output format (SVF vs SVF2).

autodesk.forge.viewer.api.description: Custom Model Derivative API used by the APS Viewer. By default, the viewer will determine the appropriate API based on the viewable output format (SVF vs SVF2).

autodesk.forge.authentication.port.description: Server port to use during 3-legged authentication workflows

autodesk.forge.data.defaultContentType.description: When defined, all uploaded files and empty objects created in OSS will use this content type.

autodesk.forge.data.uploadChunkSize.description: Size of individual chunks (in bytes) when uploading files to OSS with the resumable functionality.
